org.jdatepicker

Class JDateComponentFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdatepicker.JDateComponentFactory

  • public class JDateComponentFactory
extends Object
    Created 18 April 2010 Updated 10 August 2012
    Author:
    Juan Heyns

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JDateComponentFactory()
      Create a factory which will construct widgets with the default date model (UtilCalendarModel), date formatter (DateComponentFormatter) and i18nStrings (English).
      JDateComponentFactory(Class<? extends DateModel<?>> dateModelClass, JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatter dateFormatter, Locale locale)
      Create a factory which will construct widgets with the provided date model, date formatter and i18nStrings.
